youtube:
Kuti uwane ruzivo rwako rweRTMP yeYouTube, pinda muakaundi yako yeYouTube wobva waenda kuGADZIRA > Enda urarame. Iwe unozoona inotevera skrini:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Kopota "Stream URL" woipinza muchikamu che "Namira RTMP URL pano". Tevere, kopira "Stream kiyi" uye unamate kune "Stream kiyi" ndima. Dzvanya "Go Live" kuti utange livestream.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Unogona kuyerera kuprofile yako kuburikidza neRTMP kubva paFacebook Gadzira Live peji (uye nekudzvanya Gadzira Live Stream) kana nekudzvanya bhatani Rakararama muGadzira nzvimbo yepeji kana mbiri yaunoda kuyerera. Iwe uchaunzwa kuFacebook's Live Producer.
Skroka pasi pasi peiyo preview player. Ita shuwa pasi pe "Tanga" kuti iyo yekudonhedza menyu yakaiswa kuti Shandisa Stream Keys. Iwe uchawana iyo RTMP URL uye Stream Kiyi yeiyi kuenda. (Cherechedza: Vhidhiyo yako ichiri kuoneka pasi pakona yekurudyi.) {{facebookLive}} Kopa "URL yeServer" woiisa muchikamu che"Namira RTMP URL pano". Tevere, kopira "Stream kiyi" uye unamate kune "Stream kiyi" ndima. Dzvanya "Go Live" kuti utange livestream.
{{rtmpLive}}
